Unix printer problems

PTA uses Unix printing from SAP app servers. The critical label printers may go offline

  1. Install this shell script on all app server's cron. It will run every 15 mins and enable all printers
    0,15,30,45 * * * * /usr/local/scripts/enableprinter.sh 1>/dev/null 2>&1

    Installed on 9/27/2012 on all PTA and PTB app servers.
